title: OAF Ethiopia Monthly Newsletter
text:
Welcome to the One Acre Fund Ethiopia Monitoring, Evaluation & Learning (MEL) monthly newsletter. Each month, we share key insights, updates, and learnings from our work across Ethiopia.


The OAF Ethiopia MEL monthly newsletter provides:

Key Insights: Deep dives into important findings from our monitoring work
Program Updates: Progress reports from different regions and programs
Data Highlights: Interesting statistics and visualizations
Strategic Priorities: Upcoming focus areas and organizational priorities




Browse our monthly newsletters below. Click on any issue to read the full newsletter or download as PDF.






Note



Subscribe to receive the latest issues directly in your inbox.
Contact us at newsletter@oafethiopia.org to subscribe.
